text: Jessica Heims (born 11 December 1998) is an American Paralympics athlete who competes in discus throw events. Heims was born with amniotic band syndrome and had her left leg amputated below the knee aged one year old. She currently the world record holder in the discus throw in her sports category. ==References== Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Cedar Rapids, Iowa Category:Paralympic track and field athletes of the United States Category:American female discus throwers Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2016 Summer Paralympics
title: Jessica Heims
